item.title: #en @ 1444878296949288961
item.description: (1/2) To move towards #ReopeningSafely, it is vital our surveillance & analysis becomes more granular & predictive - for instance zooming into adolescent cases as schools reopen. I asked CPRC and the COVIDNOW team to facilitate this on the site as part of our #OpenData pledge. https://t.co/qDLgT7AQUE

item.title: #en @ 1444722432615587844
item.description: I know I'm a few days late for #DEHEMRollCall #DEHEM21, but I'm super excited! I'm a PhD student in Genetics at @jacksonlab and @TuftsGSBS. I have a circulation & nervous system disorder and dyslexia. I'm interested in bioinformatics, open data, and accessibility (in all forms).

item.description:

As always, HUGE thanks to @DKElections for their mat & open data for district info.
